name: Kemet (Abadia Games)
description:
Kemet is a 2.5D platformer and adventure game inspired by the 80's games style. 
All over the adventure, the game focus on finding back uncle Alfred who working on a curious theory over the origin of human civilization. All over his quest, our hero Alan must overcome different paths, solve several puzzles, and collect key items to save his beloved uncle.

Languages: English, Spanish Notice

I'm sorry for the translations, the story is written in Spanish, the translations were made with the google translator, my idea is to gradually upload updates with corrections.

Approximate duration: 16hs Minimum Hardware Requirements:
Processor: Core 2 Duo / Recommended: I5
Memory RAM: 4GB
HDD: 2GB 
OS: Windows 7 or higher
